songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Alright, alright, alright, alright, alright
Alright, alright, alright, alright, alright

[Verse 1]
I am walking along a very cold road and
Wherever it ends and where it begins
I do not know (oh no)
But I've noticed that (uh-huh)
It keeps rollin' and (uh-huh)
It'll take you anywhere, don't matter where you're going yeah

[Pre-Hook]
So I just want to let you know that
I'm about to let it blow
Ain't on that middle grade no
It's that professional
It ain't gon' be no pain
I'm about to let it go (let it go, let it go, let it go, let it go)

[Hook]
Goodbye (goodbye)
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'm on Cloud 9 (I said goodbye)
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'll see you next time
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'm on Cloud 9 (I said goodbye)
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'll see you next time

[Verse 2]
Now I really ain't the type to (uh-huh)
Be braggin' about my wife but (uh-huh)
Mary Jane is outta sight and (uh-huh)
She can do it all night and (for sure)
Best believe she down to blow where (was-sup)
Ever ya tryna go and (was-sup)
Oh no you need no lotion (was-sup)
Just a blunt and a nigga to roll it (for sure)

[Pre-Hook]
So I just want to let you know that
I'm about to let it blow
Ain't on that middle grade no
It's that professional
It ain't gon' be no pain
I'm about to let it go (let it go, let it go, let it go, let it go)

[Hook]
Goodbye (goodbye)
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'm on Cloud 9 (I said goodbye)
I'll be gone for a while (bye, bye, bye)
I'll see you next time (I'll be gone for a while)
I'll be gone for a while (I'll be gone for a while)
I'm on Cloud 9 (I'll be gone for while)
I'll be gone for a while (I'll be on Cloud 9)
I'll see you next time

[Outro]
Bye (bye), bye (bye), I said goodbye (I say goodbye)
Bye (bye), I'll see you next time
songs.title: Cloud 9
